name: Café Slime
description:
CONTROLS

[W] [A] [S] [D] to move camera.

Aim with your mouse.

Hold left click and release to shoot a piece of toast. Remember that power matters.

Hit a slime to get rid of it. If you let your toast stale, you can save it by hitting it again.

Right click to view and un-view your stats.

You can do it!

Music by Eric Matyas from https://soundimage.org/.

Made in a few hours.
